text: Mathond Madhuvena is a 2011 Kannada film in the comedy genre starring Anant Nag, Suhasini Maniratnam and Naveen Krishna in the lead roles. The film is a sequel to the 2010 hit film Eradane Maduve. The film has been directed and written by Dinesh Baboo and produced by Umesh Banakar and Anil Menasinakayi. Giridhar has composed the music. ==Cast== * Anant Nag * Suhasini Maniratnam * Jennifer Kotwal * Tara * Naveen Krishna * M. S. Umesh * Priyanka * Sharan * Raju Thalikote * Veena Sundar ==References== Category:2011 films Category:2010s Kannada-language films Category:Indian films Category:Films directed by Dinesh Baboo
title: Mathond Madhuvena
